text: niccayamāka nām isrāyīliṉ cantatiyaṉarai, takunta iruppiṭattil irutti, nalla uṇavukaḷaiyum koṭuttu vantōm; eṉiṉum uṇmaiyāṉa ñāṉam avarkaḷiṭam varum varaiyil avarkaḷ māṟupāṭu ceyyavillai niccayamāka um iṟaivaṉ avarkaḷ eta paṟṟi māṟupāṭu ceytu koṇṭiruntārkaḷō a(tu viṣayat)til iṟuti nāḷil avarkaḷiṭaiyē tīrppaḷippāṉ
